com.googlecode.mrsqg
Class MrsTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.mrsqg.MrsTransformer
Direct Known Subclasses:
MrsTransformer2
Deprecated. Use MrsTransformer2 instead 

public class MrsTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

This class transforms the MRS of a declarative sentence into that of a interrogative sentence.

Version:
2010-03-02
Author:
Xuchen Yao

transformWHques

protected java.util.ArrayList<MRS> transformWHques(Term[] terms)
Deprecated. 
Transform from a declarative to WH (who/which/what/where/when) interrogative.

Parameters:
terms - all the terms in this MRS.
Returns:
an ArrayList of generated interrogative MRS, or null if none.

transformHOWques

protected java.util.ArrayList<MRS> transformHOWques(Term[] terms)
Deprecated. 
Transform from a declarative to how many/much interrogative. Note: currently LKB doesn't generate from this function, for unknown reason.

Parameters:
terms - all the terms in this MRS.
Returns:
an ArrayList of generated interrogative MRS, or null if none.

setupHiLoEP

protected void setupHiLoEP(MRS q_mrs,
                           EP hiEP,
                           EP loEP,
                           java.lang.String neType)
Deprecated. 
Set up hiEP and loEP according to the named entity type neType.

Parameters:
q_mrs - an MRS for a question
hiEP - a high EP in a qeq relation
loEP - a low EP in a qeq relation
neType - a named entity type
